Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-39936 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-39936 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qt5-qtbase is earlier than 5.12.11-13, affected by CVE-2024-39936
